channel.title: How do edit ::Dropparty command on devolution? v7
channel.description:
hiya i wanted to now in devolution v7 the command ::droppart = gives out so much crap :P .. i wanted to now how do i change wt it drops and how do i change it to lummy?
also in ::randomitems it gives every1 a random item how do i give it a range of item id's cos it givin me air runes? i want it to give out a random rare item

item.title: How do edit ::Dropparty command on devolution? v7
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

It’s one of them item.java files, It has random item numbers, just change it.

Read full topic
